item.Q:
Write the character:
go through; know well; to connect; to communicate; open
item.A:
tōng
通过 (通過) tōngguò by means of; through; via; to adopt; to pass through; to get through; to switch over

item.Q:
Write the character:
1: difficult (to...); problem; difficulty; difficult; not good
2: disaster; distress; to scold
item.A:
traditional: 難
1: nán 2: nàn
困难 (困難) kūnnán difficult 难民 (難民) nànmín refugee

item.Q:
Write the character:
a division (military); teacher; master; expert; model
item.A:
traditional: 師
shī
教师 (教師) jiàoshī teacher

item.Q:
Write the character:
gas; air; smell; weather; vital breath; to anger; to get angry; to be enraged
item.A:
traditional: 氣
qì
空气 (空氣) kōngqì air; atmosphere

item.Q:
Write the character:
to hold; to seize; to catch; to apprehend; to take
item.A:
ná
加拿大 Jīanádà Canada; Canadian

item.Q:
Write the character:
elder brother
item.A:
gē
哥哥 gēge older brother

item.Q:
Write the character:
expensive; noble; your (name); precious
item.A:
traditional: 貴
guì
贵族 (貴族) guìzú lord; nobility; nobleman; noblewoman; aristocrat; aristocracy

item.Q:
Write the character:
warm; lukewarm; to review; surname
item.A:
温 (strokes unavailable)
traditional: 溫
wēn
温度 (溫度) wēndù temperature

item.Q:
Write the character:
busy
item.A:
máng
急忙 jímáng hastily
